title: Awesome List Updates on May 20, 2019

items.title: Awesome Ios Books
items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome List
items.content_text:
### Platforms

*   [Adafruit IO (⭐72)](https://github.com/adafruit/awesome-adafruitio#readme) - Visualize and store data from any device.
items.content_html:
Platforms

  • Adafruit IO (⭐72) - Visualize and store data from any device.

items.title: Awesome Maintainers
items.content_text:
*   [@antirez](https://github.com/antirez), [Redis (⭐19)](https://github.com/antirez/redis)
    *   "The struggles of an open source maintainer" ([post](http://antirez.com/news/129))
*   [@feross](http://github.com/feross), [WebTorrent (⭐30k)](https://github.com/webtorrent/webtorrent)
    *   "Recap of the `funding` experiment" ([post](https://feross.org/funding-experiment-recap/))
    *   "What I learned from WebTorrent: Lessons learned from starting and running a P2P open source project" ([slides](https://speakerdeck.com/feross/what-i-learned-from-webtorrent))
items.content_html:
• @antirez, Redis (⭐19)
    • "The struggles of an open source maintainer" (post)
  • @feross, WebTorrent (⭐30k)
    • "Recap of the funding experiment" (post)
    • "What I learned from WebTorrent: Lessons learned from starting and running a P2P open source project" (slides)

items.title: Awesome Ipfs
items.content_text:
### Tools

*   [ipfs-deploy (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/agentofuser/ipfs-deploy) - Zero-config CLI to deploy static websites: cd my-static-website && npx @agentofuser/ipfs-deploy
items.content_html:
Tools

  • ipfs-deploy (⭐1.2k) - Zero-config CLI to deploy static websites: cd my-static-website && npx @agentofuser/ipfs-deploy
